nodes.title: Should Big Decisions Be Based on Data or Your Intuition?
nodes.description: Data is black and white and incredibly useful but it does not paint the entire picture. This is where intuition comes into play.

nodes.title: Let us play with emotions
nodes.description: Fine-tuning BERT tutorial with PyTorch for emotion classification.

nodes.title: Get Started with Loophole!
nodes.description: Aspire to expose your localhost to the Internet with minimal effort? Do you wish to avoid going through the tedious deployment process? Let me introduce you to Loophole.

nodes.title: Using Machine Learning to detect fake news!
nodes.description: Develop a machine learning model to identify when an article might be fake news.
